description: A high level overview of your car

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	$__time(date),
	avg(power) AS Power,
	avg(battery_heater::integer) AS battery_heater,
	avg($efficiency / 10.0) AS "Rated Efficiency"
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1  
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	AVG(ROUND(convert_m(elevation, '$alternative_length_unit'))) AS elevation_[[alternative_length_unit]]
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1 
ORDER BY
	date ASC

WITH d AS (
	SELECT
		c.car_id,
		lag(end_[[preferred_range]]_range_km) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) - start_[[preferred_range]]_range_km AS range_loss,
		p.odometer - lag(p.odometer) OVER (ORDER BY start_date) AS distance
	FROM charging_processes c
	LEFT JOIN positions p ON p.id = c.position_id 
	WHERE
	  end_date IS NOT NULL AND
	  c.car_id = $car_id AND
	  $__timeFilter(start_date)
	ORDER BY start_date
),

range_loss_between_charges AS (
  SELECT sum(range_loss) AS range_loss
  FROM d
  WHERE distance >= 0 AND range_loss >= 0
  GROUP BY car_id
),

charge_dates AS (
	SELECT
		min(start_date) as first_charge,
		max(end_date) as last_charge
	FROM
		charging_processes
	WHERE
		end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
),

range_loss_before_first_charge AS (
	SELECT
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND ((select first_charge from charge_dates) is null OR date < (select first_charge from charge_dates))
),

range_loss_after_last_charge AS (
	SELECT
		max([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) - min([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) AS range_loss
	FROM positions, charge_dates
	WHERE
		car_id = $car_id
		AND $__timeFilter(date)
		AND date > (select last_charge from charge_dates)	
),

total_range_loss AS (
  SELECT sum(range_loss) as range_loss
  FROM (
    SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_between_charges
    UNION ALL
    SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_before_first_charge
    UNION ALL
    SELECT range_loss FROM range_loss_after_last_charge
  ) r
),

distance AS (
  SELECT max(odometer) - min(odometer) as distance
  FROM positions
  WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
)

SELECT 
  NULLIF(range_loss, 0) * (c.efficiency * 1000) / convert_km(NULLIF(distance::numeric, 0), '$length_unit') as "consumption_$length_unit"
FROM total_range_loss, distance
LEFT JOIN cars c ON c.id = $car_id

(SELECT battery_level, date
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1)
UNION
SELECT battery_level, date
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  battery_level * $BatteryCapacity / 100 as "kWh"
FROM
  charges c
join
  charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
 AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY
  c.ID DESC LIMIT 1

WITH last_position AS (
	SELECT date, convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Outside Temperature [째$temp_unit]"
	FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car_id AND outside_temp IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(date)
	ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1
),
last_charge AS (
	SELECT date, convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Outside Temperature [째$temp_unit]"
	FROM charges
	JOIN charging_processes ON charges.charging_process_id = charging_processes.id
	WHERE car_id = $car_id AND outside_temp IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(date)
	ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1
)
SELECT * FROM last_position
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM last_charge
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  date,
  convert_celsius(inside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS "Inside Temperature [째$temp_unit]"
FROM positions
WHERE
  car_id = $car_id
  and inside_temp is not null AND $__timeFilter(date)
order by date desc
limit 1

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	convert_celsius(driver_temp_setting, '$temp_unit') as "Driver Temperature [째$temp_unit]"
FROM positions
WHERE driver_temp_setting IS NOT NULL AND car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT max(odometer) - min(odometer) as distance
  FROM positions
  WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT $__time(date), range as "range_$length_unit"
FROM (
	(SELECT date, convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range
	FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car_id AND [[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
  ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1)
	UNION ALL
	(SELECT date, convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range
	FROM charges c
	JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE p.car_id = $car_id
	ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1)
) AS data
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

select $__time(date), convert_km(odometer::numeric, '$length_unit')  as "odometer_$length_unit"
from positions 
where car_id = $car_id 
order by date desc 
limit 1;

select split_part(version, ' ', 1) as version 
from updates 
where car_id = $car_id 
order by start_date desc 
limit 1

options.content:
This is a special dashboard to load while driving. When you open this dashboard it will show the last 15 minutes, but you should click the "Current Drive" button at the top right corner, to enter in Kiosk mode:

- If you are driving, you will see the information from the start time of the current drive until now and it will refesh automatically every 30 seconds.
- If you are just browsing (not driving) you will see the information of the last drive. 

Check if there is a new version at [TeslaMate Custom Grafana Dashboards](https://github.com/jheredianet/Teslamate-CustomGrafanaDashboards)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  start_date AS "time",
  start_km
FROM drives
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_date)
ORDER BY 1

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;
list.name: alternative_length_unit
list.query: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;

list.definition: SELECT drive_id FROM positions WHERE drive_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;
list.name: current_drive
list.query: SELECT drive_id FROM positions WHERE drive_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1;

list.definition:
SELECT 
  (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts
  FROM drives 
   WHERE id = $current_drive
list.name: current_drive_start_time
list.query:
SELECT 
  (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts
  FROM drives 
   WHERE id = $current_drive

list.definition:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN 'now&refresh=30s' 
  ELSE CAST(round(extract(epoch FROM end_date) - 10) * 1000 AS VARCHAR(100)) END
  FROM drives
  WHERE id = $current_drive
list.name: current_drive_end_time
list.query:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN 'now&refresh=30s' 
  ELSE CAST(round(extract(epoch FROM end_date) - 10) * 1000 AS VARCHAR(100)) END
  FROM drives
  WHERE id = $current_drive

list.definition:
WITH lastTopCharges AS (
    SELECT start_battery_level, end_battery_level, charge_energy_added, (100.0 * charge_energy_added) / (end_battery_level - start_battery_level) as Battery_Capacity
    FROM charging_processes
    WHERE charge_energy_added > 5  AND car_id = $car_id
    ORDER BY end_date DESC
    LIMIT 5
)
SELECT Battery_Capacity FROM lastTopCharges ORDER BY 1 DESC LIMIT 1
list.name: BatteryCapacity
list.query:
WITH lastTopCharges AS (
    SELECT start_battery_level, end_battery_level, charge_energy_added, (100.0 * charge_energy_added) / (end_battery_level - start_battery_level) as Battery_Capacity
    FROM charging_processes
    WHERE charge_energy_added > 5  AND car_id = $car_id
    ORDER BY end_date DESC
    LIMIT 5
)
SELECT Battery_Capacity FROM lastTopCharges ORDER BY 1 DESC LIMIT 1

list.definition:
SELECT
	CASE WHEN '$length_unit' = 'km' THEN efficiency
	     WHEN '$length_unit' = 'mi' THEN efficiency * 1.60934
	END * 1000 as "efficiency_$length_unit"
FROM
	cars
WHERE
	id = $car_id;
list.name: efficiency
list.query:
SELECT
	CASE WHEN '$length_unit' = 'km' THEN efficiency
	     WHEN '$length_unit' = 'mi' THEN efficiency * 1.60934
	END * 1000 as "efficiency_$length_unit"
FROM
	cars
WHERE
	id = $car_id;

title: Current Drive View
